history.proof: intros n ln t l H. induction H. - hauto l: on depth: 3use: ordered_cover_sind. - hauto l: on depth: 3use: ordered_cover_sind.

ctx: intros n ln t l H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros n ln t l H. induction H. - apply ordered_cover_one. - eapply ordered_cover_sind. + apply IHheight_pred1. + apply IHheight_pred2.
